content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Employee]
(
 EMPLOYEE_ID INT,
 FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(30),
 LAST_NAME VARCHAR(30),
 EMAIL NVARCHAR(50),
 PHONE_NUMBER NVARCHAR(50),
 HIRE_DATE NVARCHAR(20),
 JOB_ID NVARCHAR(30),
 SALARY DECIMAL(10,2),
 MANAGER_ID INT,
 DEPARTMENT_ID INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (EMPLOYEE_ID),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Employee]
